Description_lang: The victim slowly turns to stone, moving and attacking slower for $d. This effect stacks, causing the victim to move and attack even slower.  While turning to stone, the victim takes less damage from all sources.After 10 stacks, the victim is completely petrified.$@spelldesc309709
AuraDescription_lang: Movement speed reduced by $s1%.Haste reduced by $s2%.Damage taken reduced by $s3%.After 10 stacks the victim is petrified for $309709d.
